title: Tucker Max, Book Publishing & Creative Storytelling  | #AskGaryVee Episode 207
description:
Tucker's Free Book on How to Publish a Book: bookinabox.com/gary

#QOTD: Please take a look at our site: bookinabox.com - what do you think we are doing wrong in terms of messaging or marketing? Our audience is people who have great ideas for books, who can monetize those ideas (ex. coaches, consultants, CEOs, people who have had success)- what are we doing right and wrong to talk to those people? Feel free to contact Tucker @ bookinabox
